events.message: I received the wrong item and would like to request a refund as soon as possible since this is not what I ordered.
The system has classified the customer's issue under the Refund category based on keywords indicating a refund request.
The case has been assigned to customer support agent Lisa Thompson for further handling of the refund request.
Hello! I'm Lisa and I will be assisting you with your refund request. Could you please confirm your order number and provide some details about the item received?
Can you please send us a photo of the item you received and confirm if it is unopened or used? This helps us process your refund swiftly.
Here is a photo of the incorrect item. The package was opened but I did not use the product. I just want my money back or the correct product sent.
Thank you for the details. We will issue a full refund immediately and arrange for the wrong item to be picked up at your convenience within the next 3 days.
Thanks for your quick help and the offer for a pick-up. I appreciate the prompt response and look forward to resolving this soon.
We have processed your refund and scheduled return pick-up. You should see the refund reflected in your account within 5-7 business days.
Just checking in to confirm you received the refund and that the pick-up of the wrong item was completed smoothly. Please let us know if any further assistance is needed.
Since you confirmed everything is resolved, we are closing this refund case. Thank you for your patience and have a great day!
